title: Can we stop pretending rylais isn't busted right now?
body:
Can this item please get a meaningful nerf in some way? 

It's being build on almost every Mage not named Lissandra. It double dips into hp/AP while having an insanely good build path that lets you get the best of hp or AP. The slows are way too powerful, especially on ranged aoe spells.

This item needs to be toned down. Everyone is bitching about Frozen Mallet when it's only being built on two champions, meanwhile my grandma built rylais in my oatmeal this morning. Please nerf this item.

replies.body:
There's a reason why people don't really complain about rylais. Even with it, and whatever else "double-dipping items" (you know lifesteal is a defensive stat right?) mages are still squishy and easy to punish when out of position. 

Meanwhile, FM encourages permanent stickiness on champs that a team can neither afford to focus nor ignore. Not only that, but it creates an immense amount of control in dueling situations, where the enemy is forced to either win the fight or die due to being unable to run away.
